A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The writers clearly didn't know the workings of the universe. Y-wing bombers are replaced by ww2 style gravity carpet bombing in space. A senior admiral doesn't know how to lead her troops\, dead people come back to life etc. For those who like their sci-fi with some consistent internal mechanics this is a major disappointment. To name another blatant break in established lore: lasers are fired like long range artillery\, with the shells arching to the target.
